comment: Great Professor! Loved this class. Go to class, do the work and you will pass. Wish I could have taken her for other classes!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: I loved this class, but it is really hard at first, but she gives lots of study material that is similar to the exams and extra credit. She's really nice and looks like Erin from the office and sounds like Pam, which was cool. I definitely recommend taking her, she made a Saturday class great, and that's hard to do.
the best teacher and highly recommend to take her. she makes the class easier and do not take attendance. if you do take the you will get an A... The best.

Good professor. TONS of extra credit. Drops lowest quiz, homework, and test if you complete the pre/post exam worksheets (which are also extra credit) and do better on the final than your lowest test. Do the work and practice problems she gives and its impossible to fail.

Professor Ereddia really, REALLY cares about all her students and tries to help all of them reach their maximum potential. Although there is a lot of work, she gives many opportunities for students to succeed and get extra credit as well. Honestly the most caring professor I have had at KSU no doubt. GOAT tings.

Professor Erredia is amazing! My first time I took accounting was with Ybor Tsay and I failed the class. Took it with Erredia, passed with an A! Provides examples, works out problems, do every extra credit assignment, homework and exam practices! She really cares and always responds right away to emails/concerns. She is amazing!!!

Fantastic professor. Actually made me switch my major to accounting. She gives very clear examples of what will be on each exam. Also gives a few extra credit opportunities. You can tell she actually cares about the class and her students.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great teacher, newer to KSU. Very caring and wants everyone to do well. Willing to go above and beyond. Does lots of practice and allows for many extra credit opportunities. Focuses a lot on real world application. Does not take attendance. Very understanding will drop your lowest grade on a quiz and homework and replace a test grade with final.
Great class. Doesn't give you all the "fluff" that all of other teachers give when teaching. Good energy, and realistic situations

Great prof; although, was repetitive from class to class about reviewing slides from previous class. Would have been better to spend that time just doing problems instead of reading text or listening to her talk. Wants students to succeed. Very nice and will stay late to help you. Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--LECTURE HEAVY
